      • test_blockingAllocation

        public void test_blockingAllocation()
                             throws InterruptedException,
                                    ExecutionException,
                                    TimeoutException
        Unit test in which we verify that a thread will block awaiting an allocation until another thread releases an allocation, thereby making enough memory available for the thread to continue.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        TimeoutException
        ExecutionException - TODO Version of test with lt blob size allocations, with blob size allocations, and with sector (or more) sized allocations.
